info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:13PM EDT until July 13 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Otsego County in central New York... Southeastern Madison County in central New York... Southeastern Cortland County in central New York... Northern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 413 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Taylor to Willet, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Norwich, Brookfield, Edmeston, Plymouth, North Norwich, Sherburne, Pittsfield, New Lisbon, Solon and Cincinnatus. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
